response:
"wie kann man noch immer davon sprechen, dass die verantwortung für den schutz personenbezogener informationen bei uns selber liegt? es ist doch klar, dass die unternehmen und organisationen, die unsere daten sammeln und verwenden, eine viel größere rolle spielen sollten. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #verantwortung"

translation: "how can we still talk about the responsibility for protecting personal information being on ourselves? it's clear that companies and organizations that collect and use our data have a much greater role to play. #dataprotection #privacy #responsibility"

this post critically examines the common notion that individuals are solely responsible for protecting their personal information in the digital age. it suggests that companies and organizations which collect and use personal data should take on more responsibility for ensuring data privacy, rather than placing the burden entirely on individuals. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #verantwortung (responsibility) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on this topic.
